title: 124 - Mitt "Hosts" An Episode
description: On today's show, Mitt gives a crack at hosting the show as Tony is on vacation somewhere, the boys chat about The Pod's budding relationship with pornstar Brandi Love, have a in-depth roundtable discussion on the premiere episode of Young Rock and whether or not they're sticking it out through the rest of the season, they dive into a Pod FOD that is loaded with some "pick 3 situations," Bill strategically places packs of Pokemon cards around the studio for the boys to find, and Nick unleashes a couple of new Friday Bangerz to help send you into the weekend. As always, send your submissions into @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram to be featured on the show. We appreciate the hell out of you all for listening, if you're battling the winter weather, stay safe out there. We'll see you on Monday.
dc:creator: The Pod
